name: Samrajya
description:
Samrajya

NOTE: This game is still in development. Feel free to provide any feedback and suggestions for new units, buildings, mechanics and such in the comments.

Samrajya(lit. Empire, in Sanskrit) is a real-time strategy game inspired from the mechanics of Age of Empires. The controls are as follows:

W,  A, S, D (or) moving the mouse to the screen edges - Move camera

E + left mouse drag -  Rotate camera

Left mouse drag - Box selection

Left click - Single selection, interact with UI, go through subtitles

Right click - move unit, attack, set rally point, gather, attack (if you've played any RTS game, it will be obvious)

Made by a college student with a lot of free time on his hands.

As with all standard RTS games, you have the ability to command your townspeople to:

Gather,

Explore,

Build,

Construct a navy,

and fight, of course.

There are some environmental indicators, such as palm trees, which hint at water nearby.

Last but not least, system requirements:

Recommended: Intel Core i5, Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050

Minimum: Intel Core i3, Intel HD Graphics 620 (possible to run on even lower-end systems, but can't guarantee it'll be smooth)

To maximize performance, go to the Graphics tab in the Main Menu and switch off Shadows and Bloom. However, if your setup is better than the recommended requirements, then it may not be necessary.
